column5: PED SK Energy simon Kukes and Bln pedco simon Kukes the only 2 institutional owners of substance in ped where are the other investors in this Gem Oh you say they all sold out over the last year as the dilution came this is a supposed big time Oil company in the best areas and drilling like mad with the smartest guy in oil at the helm you would think ped would have value like Anadarko Maybe Im putting the cart before the horse here and I should just hope for the day ped makes one dollar on the positive side of the ledger just one dollar instead of millions in losses
